Page Description.Description: This is the current page for Site-listed achievements. To be eligible for these achievements, please download the associated game "A CHALLENGE", run it for a few minutes (you might need to download Steam 360 Video Player, it's already in your library under "Tools" section), close the game, and then update your profile. You should then show up in the full completions after a while and can post your proof.

As God Intended.Description: Obtain 5 or more community objectives with "Made of" in their title.
As God Intended.Requirements: Link to CE profile. Awards the "Made of Everything" role.

Big Game Hunter.Requirements: Tag the mod who handles bounties in the Discord server. Awards the black variant of "Bounty Hunter".

Chase the Rainbow.Description: Obtain a role of every possible color (not including custom Patreon colors).
Chase the Rainbow.Requirements: Screenshot of roles on discord. The tier enthusiast roles do not count towards completion. The required roles are one of Green, Blue, Orange, Yellow, Red, and Black. Nitro Booster, Mod, Rank, Bounty Hunter, and Patreon colors are not required.

Conspiracy Theory.Description: Obtain any black role on the same day another member obtains any black role (excluding Patreon roles).

Destiny Alignment.Description: You and another player of the same rank ask Scarlet to roll a random game the other person has completed. Both players must go on to complete all primary objectives in each game.

Page Description.Description: This page serves as a list of puzzle games on Steam curated by CE. Each game listed will require you to either complete all or specific achievements within the game, or complete all in-game puzzles offered. The difficulty of these objectives are gauged on a three-tier system, ranging from Moderate (🟨), to Challenging (🟥), to Extreme (⬛). A specialized potentials list for puzzle games can be found here: <https://tinyurl.com/Puzzle-Games>. Games are added to this list through a voting system within the CE Discord server—if you wish to participate in the voting system, ask any of the Discord mods for the "@Puzzle Enthusiast" role.

You Have to Be the Completionist.Requirements: Screenshot of ending screen with stats OR video of the run.

You Have to Be the Hoarder.Requirements: Screenshot of ending screen with stats OR video of the run.

Cirno's Perfect Danmaku Class.Description: Beat a route on Lunatic without continuing.

Flower Viewing.Description: Beat a route on Normal or higher without continuing.
Flower Viewing.Requirements: Screenshot of leaderboard OR owning "Cirno's Perfect Danmaku Class".

Above Zero.Description: Beat a route on Lunatic without dying and bombing.

Beaten at Her Own Game.Description: Beat the Extra mode without dying and bombing. (Drain lasers are allowed)

The Strongest!.Description: Beat all routes on Lunatic without continuing.
The Strongest!.Requirements: Screenshots of leaderboard/stage end screen and videos of at least one route.

Adol Begins.Description: Complete Ys I on Nightmare difficulty. / Complete Ys I Time Attack.

Adol the Red.Description: Obtain all achievements and complete all primary objectives from all available games in the Ys franchise. See verification requirements for complete list.
Adol the Red.Requirements: Link to steam profile. Required games are Ys I, Ys II, Ys Origin, Ys Memories of Celceta, Ys The Oath of Felghana, Ys The Lacrimosa of Dana, Ys The Ark of Napishtim, Ys SEVEN, Ys Monstrum Nox.

The Black Pearl Rises.Description: Complete Ys II on Nightmare difficulty. / Complete Ys II Time Attack.

Scars of the Divine Wing.Description: Complete Boss Rush on Nightmare difficulty with all versions of all characters.

The Wind of Zemeth.Description: Complete the game on Nightmare difficulty.

Forest Guardian.Description: Finish normal mode without leveling up.

They Keep Jamming Anyways.Description: Don't use any photocopiers during the game.

Maizetermind.Description: Score 14 points or more on Challenge 10.

Fool's Errand.Description: Complete a custom game with all enemy counts and difficulties set to the maximum.

Through the Stars.Description: Beat the hidden stage without continues. / Beat the boss rush.

Tabletop Hero.Description: Complete the Hell difficulty with all heroes.

Rollin' Warrior.Description: Complete the Hard difficulty with all heroes.

Frog Prince.Description: Clear Iron Frog mode in less than 25 minutes.

Classically Challenging.Description: Separately; earn 25k in Challenge mode and beat Heroic mode.

Trascending Time and Space (UNCLEARED).Description: On Lunatic, reach and beat the TLB of Stage INF without using continues. (Get the Unexpected Ending)

Undefined Rad Ability.Description: Beat the game on Ura without using continues.

Bountiful Day.Description: Beat the game on Lunatic or higher without using continues. / Beat the Lunatic Extra mode.
Bountiful Day.Requirements: Screenshot of replay scores or final score in runs.

Silent Night.Description: Beat the game on Normal or higher without using continues. / Beat the Extra mode or higher.
Silent Night.Requirements: Screenshot of replay scores or final score in runs.

Riddle Me This.Description: Beat the Lunatic Extra mode without dying and bombing.

The Power of Wheat.Description: Beat the game on Ura without dying and bombing.

Illogical.Description: Unlock and capture all Last Words.

Empathical.Description: Beat the game on Normal or higher without continues. / Beat the (normal) Extra mode.
Empathical.Requirements: Screenshots of ending screens or leaderboard.

Anomaly (UNCLEARED).Description: Beat the game on Overdrive without continues.

Logic Shaper (UNCLEARED).Description: Beat the game on Lunatic or higher without continues. / Beat the Elite Extra mode.

In the Name of Love.Description: Beat the game on Overdrive without dying and Aspect Shifting.

Painting for Your Soul.Description: Beat the (normal) Extra mode without dying and Aspect Shifting.

Fly Through Scarlet.Description: Clear the game without dying on any difficulty. / Capture all the spell cards in Spellcard Challenges. / Score over 2 billion in Hard difficulty or higher.

Fantastic Flight.Description: Clear the final boss of extra story without hurts. / Reach 80,000 grazing count.

Phantasmic Flight.Description: Clear Phantasm without deaths, bombs and barriers.
